name: afrikad-monorepo
description: AfriKAD - Pay globally from Africa in one tap

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:admin
